Class SimpleControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimpleControl

  • public class SimpleControl
extends java.lang.Object
    The control unit for the simple implementation scheme. The decode step should use Table 4.18 from the textbook to set each of the data members. In addition to the control lines listed in Table 4.18, when the instruction is an unconditional branch, the Uncondbranch control line should be asserted. The Uncondbranch control line should be deasserted when the instruction is anything other than an unconditional branch. This class is implemented in the style of a struct: All data members are public and there are no methods.
